meanings.sent1: The situation was noncrisis, just a small issue to resolve.
meanings.sent2: She remained calm during the noncrisis situation.
meanings.sent3: The noncrisis event turned out to be a simple misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: His noncrisis approach to problem-solving helped keep everyone relaxed.
meanings.sent5: The noncrisis atmosphere in the office was a welcome change from the usual chaos.

meanings.definition: A situation that is not a crisis.
meanings.sent1: The team handled the noncrisis with ease and efficiency.
meanings.sent2: We were relieved when we realized it was just a noncrisis.
meanings.sent3: The noncrisis at the party was when the cake almost fell but didn't.
meanings.sent4: In the world of superheroes, this was just a noncrisis compared to what they usually face.
meanings.sent5: The noncrisis in the movie added a touch of humor to the intense plot.
